column5: okay, been hearing a lot about brown and rainbow trout in the grand river , and after seeing all the posts about the trout opener, I've been wondering if you can catch them in and around the York area? Never caught a trout before btw..
Caldonia by the Dam (but not too close). Upstream of Caldonia there's a variety of good spots. York is not a regular stopping place for the trout as they move through.
